Articles.Content:
Hello,

my suggestion today is a Mk3 Tail with loadig ramp liket there is in B9 Aerospace.

This would make huge cargo planes much easier aswell some bigger wings would be nice.
In the mean while, you can try this mod here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-90-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-SXT-19-07DEC14-KSC-v3
I'd like to see that. In the mean time, more mods for me.
